devServerTarget.description: A dev-server builder target to run tests against in the format of `target` or `[project]:target[:configuration]`. You can also pass in more than one configuration name as a comma-separated list. Example: `project:target:production,staging`.

baseUrl.description: Base URL for playwright to connect to.

port.description: The port to use to serve the application

browser.description: Run test in a specific browser

config.description: Configuration file, if not passed, defaults to `playwright.config.ts` or `playwright.config.js` in the project's folder

debug.description: Run tests with Playwright Inspector. Shortcut for `PWDEBUG=1` environment variable and `--timeout=0 --maxFailures=1 --headed --workers=1` options

forbidOnly.description: Whether to disallow `test.only`, useful on CI

grep.description: Only run tests matching this regular expression

grepInvert.description: Only run tests not matching this regular expression, the opposite of `grep`

globalTimeout.description: Total timeout for the whole test run in milliseconds, by default there is no global timeout

headed.description: Run tests in headed browsers, useful for debugging

list.description: List all the tests, but do not run them

maxFailures.description: Stop after the first `N` test failures, passing `true` stops after the first failure

output.description: Directory for artifacts produced by tests, defaults to `test-results`

passWithNoTests.description: Allows the test suite to pass when no files are found

project.description: Only run tests from one of the specified projects, defaults to running all projects defined in the configuration file

quiet.description: Whether to suppress stdout and stderr from the tests

repeatEach.description: Run each test `N` times, defaults to one

reporter.description: Choose a reporter: minimalist `dot`, concise `line`, detailed `list`, machine-readable `json` or `junit` or the package name of a 3rd party reporter

retries.description: The maximum number of retries for flaky tests, defaults to zero (no retries)

shard.description: Shard tests and execute only selected shard, specified in the form `current/all`, 1-based, for example `3/5`.

timeout.description: Maximum timeout in milliseconds for each test, defaults to 30 seconds

updateSnapshots.description: Whether to update snapshots with actual results instead of comparing them

workers.description: The maximum number of concurrent worker processes that run in parallel
